General.Name: Pomifrutas S/A
General.Description: Pomifrutas S/A engages in the cultivation and sales of apples in Brazil. The company offers apples, including Gala, Royal Gala, Imperial Gala, Fuji, and Fuji Supreme varieties of fresh fruit. It is also involved in forestry and reforestation; production of seedlings and seeds; beekeeping; and plant extraction activities, as well as trade, export, and import of fruits, vegetables, and related derivatives; and packaging and the provision of services in the areas of classification and storage of plant products. The company's brands include POMIFRAI/POMI FRUTAS, LAIS, MALUS FRAI, and STAR APPLE Very. Pomifrutas S/A was founded in 1962 and is based in Fraiburgo, Brazil.
General.Address: Rodovia SC 355 - Km 28, Fraiburgo, SC, Brazil
